snippet.title: Qix (Amiga) | No commentary, 1080p 60FPS
snippet.description:
💾 More Amiga games ► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEXiKm54CARSqoV4Bhhge9ubCRqxCO8Pm
📙 I wish I was better at Qix. I think I'm overthinking it in this video. Maybe I'll make a better one later.
Great port of the 1981 Taito arcade game, with weird cool music by Tim Follin. I believe the version I was playing as a kid was an NTSC game, not designed for PAL machines. NTSC games were designed to run at a frame rate of 60 Hz and PAL games at 50 HZ. The gameplay worked OK running a bit slower, but the music also ran 20% slower, which is a lot! Tim Follin's interesting sample choices coupled with this unintentional slowness gave it a weird, dreamy feeling that stuck with me for the last 30 years. It's interesting how an accident like this can sometimes create a unique impression in the listener.

#qix #syltefar_amiga #syltefar
